definition: to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: The general rules of avian community succession.
sentences.chinese: 崇明东滩湿地鸟类群落的演替规律。

sentences.english: But that of the fixed dunes is the contention between species.
sentences.chinese: 固定沙丘群落的演替动力是种间竞争的结果。

sentences.english: Coverage is an important quantitative index for plant community structure.
sentences.chinese: 盖度或者覆盖度是植物群落结构的一个重要数量指标。

sentences.english: Faunal assemblage are directly related to the depositional environment.
sentences.chinese: 动物群落与沉积环境有直接关系。

sentences.english: A community-type, as a class-concept, is inescapably an abstraction .
sentences.chinese: 群落类型，作为一个阶级概念，无疑也是一种抽象。

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla forest is a famous Tertiary relict phytocommunity-in the world.
sentences.chinese: 银杉林是当今举世瞩目的第三纪残遗植物群落。

sentences.english: In chigger mite communities, Leototrombidium orientale are dominant species for all hosts.
sentences.chinese: 恙螨群落中，东方纤恙螨为不同鼠种的优势种。

sentences.english: With the succession, the species diversity of the tree layer increased gradually.
sentences.chinese: 随着青冈群落演替进行，乔木层物种多样性逐渐增大。

sentences.english: The biodiversity index of cultivated grassland was also the highest.
sentences.chinese: 刈草草地昆虫群落多样性指数相对较高。

sentences.english: The soil fumigation can increase the richness and evenness of nematode community.
sentences.chinese: 各消毒处理能提高线虫群落丰富度和均匀度。

sentences.english: Community structure of Chitons in the Rocky Intertidal Zone of Islands in South Zhejiang were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浙南岛屿岩相潮间带石鳖的群落结构。

sentences.english: Absolute dominant species was M. brandti in rodent community during 1970-1997.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，田鼠在鼠类群落中占绝对优势。

sentences.english: The Interseeding results showed that the dominant species is Stipa aliena which average important value is 0.
sentences.chinese: 通过补播试验表明，补播后异针茅仍然是群落优势种。

sentences.english: Water quality and self-purification capability of lakes are greatly influenced by the community structure of fish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼类群落结构影响着湖泊的水质和水体的自净能力。

sentences.english: Microbial inoculum could enhance microbial community functional diversity and evenness degree.
sentences.chinese: 接种菌剂提高了微生物群落功能多样性和群落均匀度。

sentences.english: Microbial inoculum could enhance microbial community functional diversity and evenness degree.
sentences.chinese: 接种菌剂提高了微生物群落功能多样性和群落均匀度。

definition: population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
to live together (in a large group or flock)
succession (of changes in an ecological community)/naturally evolving sequence
